channel.title: Bootstrapped.fm, episode 94, “Franchise Friends”
channel.description:
In this episode we discuss kindergarten, kids destroying tablets, side projects for founders, encryption in Scribbleton, and more.
[Listen to the episode](http://bootstrapped.fm/94-franchise-friends/)
